Open Source Projects

Occasionally I release projects I've written for work or just for fun. You can view them all on my GitHub profile.

vslider

A simple content slider that allows you to make a list of elements scrollable with animation.

mysqlDB

An abstraction class for PHP's mysqli library. Sanitizes inputs, prepares statements, and more.

WPification

Helper functions for making common WordPress tasks easier.

selecta

jQuery plugin that progressively enhances HTML <select> tags.

float

jQuery plugin that makes an input field only allow a float or integer value.

sc-scraper

Command-line ruby script to scrape HTML and download SoundCloud files.

mlr.github.com

Source code for new jekyll-based website for my portfolio, projects, and blog.
